game.name: Shadey's Quest
game.shortDescription: Shadey’s Quest is an autobattler roguelike featuring character building. Shadey is a cute monster who wants to be a hero, but the only thing he is good at is eating. Guide him through the enchanting fantasy world, feed and equip him and help him defeat the fearsome King of Shadows!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shadey’s Quest is an autobattler roguelike featuring character building. Shadey is a cute monster who wants to be a hero, but the only thing he is good at is eating. Guide him through the enchanting fantasy world, feed and equip him and help him defeat the fearsome King of Shadows!
